data.what_is:
Hunch helps marketing teams scale revenue efficiently through personalization and stay ahead of the game using automation and AI.


Hunch is an AI-powered creative automation platform with media buying that eliminates manual tasks and enables delivering on-brand ads across all channels and markets at scale. By automating creative production and delivery, Hunch helps mid-market brands, independent agencies meet their creative demands efficiently. As a Meta Business Partner and company trusted by top brands like Academy Sports and Dedoles, Hunch proves its capability to deliver scalable and innovative advertising solutions that will bring faster revenue uplifts.
data.product_description: Hunch provides powerful, integrated solutions that enable data, creative, and media to work together for optimal campaign performance across the entire customer journey on paid social.

plan_features: 1-month pilot period. After the pilot period you can cancel the contract or sign up for a yearly subscription.
During your trial period all our plans come with a monthly package of 3 image templates and 2 video templates custom-built by our designers at no additional cost. *
In case of scarce internal design resources, you can always buy more designs on demand.
Furthermore, our Customer Success team and Support Chat ensures a smooth execution of your Meta and Snap campaigns in the Hunch platform.

pricing_plans.plan_description: In need of creative end-to-end solutions for your paid social campaigns? We got you covered. Based on your brief we deliver highly performative images and videos for your paid social campaigns.
plan_features: Get in contact with us for individual creative end-to-end options.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: API / Integrations
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software such as other ad servers, DSPs, DMPs, etc. 16 reviewers of Hunch have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Custom Reports
features.content: Based on 14 Hunch reviews. Able to create custom reports to cater to specific metrics and key performance indicators.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 19 Hunch reviews. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 21 Hunch reviews. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Enterprise Scalability
features.content: Provides features to allow scaling for large organizations. This feature was mentioned in 17 Hunch reviews.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique process. Includes ability to create custom objetcs, fields, rules, calculations, and views. 22 reviewers of Hunch have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: As reported in 18 Hunch reviews. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users. Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step. Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: As reported in 18 Hunch reviews. Enables users to create and manage campaigns with the same content in multiple languages and currencies. Marketer can place ads on websites from around the world.

features.name: Notifications
features.content: Alerts marketer of the performance of particular campaigns. 16 reviewers of Hunch have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Campaign Dashboard
features.content: Overview of all media purchases and campaigns in a single interface. 21 reviewers of Hunch have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Campaign Optimization
features.content: As reported in 22 Hunch reviews. Enables marketer to set metrics by which their campaigns are automatically optimized.

features.name: Reach
features.content: As reported in 20 Hunch reviews. Amount and quality of inventory partner sites on which ads can be placed.

features.name: Bulk Editing
features.content: Based on 18 Hunch reviews. Enables marketers to edit campaigns in bulk as opposed to one piece at a time.

features.name: Batch Uploading
features.content: Based on 16 Hunch reviews. Allows marketer to upload campaign inventory in a single batch instead of one piece at a time.

features.name: Brand Safety
features.content: As reported in 19 Hunch reviews. Ensures marketer's ads are placed on respectable websites that won't damage brand image or reputation.

features.name: Frequency Capping
features.content: As reported in 18 Hunch reviews. Allows marketer to set a limit on how many times a consumer sees their ad.

features.name: Budget Pacing
features.content: Allows marketer to set a daily or weekly campaign budget that the ad sever uses to make appropriate bids. 19 reviewers of Hunch have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Creative Optimization
features.content: Based on 20 Hunch reviews. Tools offered for creating and optimizing creative components of campaigns.

features.name: Rich Media Capabilties
features.content: Supports rich media display and video ads that involve user interaction. 14 reviewers of Hunch have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Social Functionality
features.content: As reported in 19 Hunch reviews. Product functionality for social advertising.

features.name: Targeting
features.content: Based on 21 Hunch reviews. Able to target desired audiences based on demographics and behavior variables.

features.name: Retargeting
features.content: Able to retarget previous impressions to your site across the web to increase conversion rates. This feature was mentioned in 21 Hunch reviews.

features.name: Geo-Targeting
features.content: As reported in 20 Hunch reviews. Able to tailor ads based on consumer general region, state or designated market area (DMA).

features.name: Contextual Targeting
features.content: Based on 18 Hunch reviews. Able to match the marketer's ad with specific content on a site or page.

features.name: Ad Templates
features.content: Offers pre-made ad templates that can be filled in.

features.name: Automated Ad Creation
features.content: Auto-creates ads using templating and/or data.

features.name: Dynamic Versioning
features.content: Allows for multiple versions of a marketing campaign to be run simulanteously.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test changes to a screen by administering the change to a portion of visitors and measuring conversion.

features.name: Campaign Scheduling
features.content: Schedules marketing campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_title: A valuable partner who thinks along and inspires us
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
The experts at Hunch actively engage with us, promptly addressing challenges as they arise and providing swift responses to our inquiries.

Currently, we're leveraging the tool for Shopping ads, but we have yet to explore its video capabilities and dynamic video functionalities. Our goal is to integrate these features by the end of Q2. While there are numerous other functionalities offered by the tool, we have not yet had the opportunity to develop use cases for them. This is a key objective for 2024, allowing us to fully leverage Hunch as an extension of our creative team.

Presently, only our social advertising consultants utilize Hunch, but we aim to introduce the tool to our design studio. We want our designers to discover how Hunch can streamline their workflow, enabling them to create designs efficiently with a focus on social content.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Currently, we haven't encountered any aspects of Hunch that we dislike. This could be attributed to our limited exploration of the tool's full capabilities. However, we trust that the specialists at Hunch are readily available to provide solutions should any issues arise in the future.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
* Improving efficiency and effectiveness in managing Shopping ads and potentially expanding to utilize its video capabilities and dynamic functionalities

* Enhancing creativity and streamlining workflow within the design studio, particularly focusing on social content creation

* Seeking a reliable partner who can offer prompt solutions to challenges and provide valuable insights to inspire and support your team's goals

* Exploring and maximizing the full range of functionalities that Hunch offers to fully integrate it as an extension of your creative team

initial_reviews.review_title: Relevant & personal campaign strategies with Hunch!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
Hunch made our campaign strategies more relevant and personal for the target audience. Everything we wanted to create had been made possible thanks to the super fast customer support. Once you know which strategy is behind the campaigns the implementation is relatively ease.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Little bugs which have great effect on your whole campaign are easily made and something hard to discover where they are coming from. Making sure Hunch pussed the right data to META can be a challenge sometimes.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
Time! As well for campaign set up and optimazation as the content creation.

initial_reviews.review_title: A comprehensive tool and great customer service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
Hunch have always provided us excellent service in teaching, troubleshooting and finding solutions. Their tool offers a comprehensive set of solutions for creative management in Facebook which we have used for numerous clients.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
We have seen some issue with the results of using Hunch for Dynamic Product Ads, high CPCs for example compared to control groups. Though this may come down to the creative in use and not the platform. User permissions have also created some confusion at times.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
We engaged with Hunch primarily to test Dynamic Product ads and their creative suite was one of the best we had seen. The dynamic rules allowed us to solve complicated problems, primarily for messaging sale through these campaigns in a visually interesting way. We were pleased with the ability to import PSDs, and the suite of visual tools available. Some rules were finicky, but Hunch always helped us resolve quickly which was greatly appreciated.

review_question_answers.answer: Hunch have always provided us excellent service in teaching, troubleshooting and finding solutions. Their tool offers a comprehensive set of solutions for creative management in Facebook which we have used for numerous clients.

initial_reviews.review_title: Automate, Accelerate, Amplify Your Revenue!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
Hunch has revolutionized the way we approach advertising. The platform's automation capabilities have propelled our advertising efforts to new heights. We no longer have to spend countless hours manually creating each creative piece or managing media placements. Hunch Ads handles it all effortlessly, utilizing cutting-edge technology to generate and distribute captivating creatives across media channels.

Just imagine the potential when you can redirect your time and energy towards strategic planning and decision-making rather than being bogged down by repetitive tasks. Hunch Ads empowers us to allocate our resources where they make a difference, driving our business forward with unparalleled efficiency. It's a game-changer that enables us to achieve remarkable results and stay ahead of the competition.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
While Hunch Ads offers remarkable benefits, occasional campaign crashes upon sending to Facebook can be an area of improvement that needs attention.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
Within our company, we've faced a hurdle with our creative team regarding the availability of skilled designers, specifically in DPA creatives. This has directly affected our ability to achieve the desired results. To overcome this challenge, we are actively collaborating with the Hunch creative team to address this obstacle and ensure we deliver the desired outcomes.

As a performance manager in the betting industry, Hunch has been a tremendous asset in streamlining our daily live match offers. It has allowed us to fully automate our website's extensive offerings comprising hundreds of ads. This level of automation ensures we can efficiently promote our offerings while saving valuable time and resources. Thanks to Hunch, we can confidently deliver a comprehensive and engaging experience to our customers, maximizing the impact of our marketing efforts.

I like the feed management tools, the creative templating tool and I love that they are willing to create custom solutions with us for things we need...and they are fast!

What do you dislike about Hunch?
The reporting isn't so strong so I tend to use business manager for that b ut we are working on a solution for this!

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation with feed-based ads and creative templating. It's allowing us to create many ads from the feed at the same time and also keeps up with when products are going on and offline which happens quite a lot! We also saw an increased CTR and I think that's down to the creative templates which we adapted from the Hunch library.

Easy to use, good collaboration with support, great suggestions for campaign improvement. We use it every day and all of this means a lot to us. There are lot of features we like - great templates, possibility of creating videos and materials for other channels etc. It is easy to use and we adopted it very quickly thanks to Hucnh onboarding team.

Some technical things could be improved i.e. search campaigns and ad sets, possibility to change exact ad set without reseting choice.

initial_reviews.review_title: Time-saving tool & a very helpful team
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
Entirely straightforward & easy to use once you get the hang of it. It benefits webshops with many products, making navigating and creating automated, custom ads less complicated. The Hunch team provides endless support regarding both tech and creative aspects and quickly resolves any issues you might have while creating your ads.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Seldom it will fail to send the campaign to Meta. Most of our company's issues transpired due to Meta and not Hunch itself. Even if any problems arise, the team behind Hunch is swift to provide assistance.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using Hunch saves us a lot of time. It's easier to use, visually clearer and neater than Ads Manager. Thus, we are able to prepare our campaigns more swiftly, shortening the number of days spent on getting the ads running.

initial_reviews.review_title: Dynamic social ads and creative platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
Possibility to export many designs, dynamic ads, creating catalog sales ads, automated campaigns, easy to navigate (much more than Meta), background removal for images, etc.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Not being able to change product set in active campaign in real time and having to wait for catalog to sync. It doesnt have the option for optimizing the campaign so you have to do it on Meta after creating ads.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?

initial_reviews.review_title: We achieved 47% lower CAC on Facebook using Hunch by delivering localised ads to over 110 areas
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
Creating customised ads at scale and publishing them to Facebook works like a breeze. During an important season, we delivered over 700 ads to over 110 ad sets on Facebook in an instant. We were able to customise creatives and copies by including dynamic values such as local slang, area name and target audiences. I also like that we can run ads directly from a Google Sheet and Google Drive (so we don't have to go into Ads Manager to create ads which is a tedious process). Hunch's customer support is top-notch. They have given us the support needed to bring our ideas into reality.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Creating new campaigns can be overwhelming if you don't create them regularly (at least I tend to forget all the nitty gritty settings that need to be set for the campaign to work out properly). However, with Hunch's awesome customer support this hasn't been an issue as they have helped us set up new campaigns everytime it has been needed.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
Save time (from the tedious process of publishing ads in Ads Manager). Publish ads at scale (we can publish hundreds of ads in an instant). Localise ads (now we can use customised ads to create more engaging content).

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the best FB automation tools!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
I love that you can make thousands of custom ads from all your e-commerce products just by creating 1 template. This helps you to test your ad creative very fast and find which one performs the best. This process would usually spend a lot of time and resources while Hunch lets you do it automatically.
You can even connect your account with Google Analytics and let Hunch create ads from just your best-performing products to increase your profit.

Another great feature is the smart automatic post boosting. This would mean that you can make your regular organic post content and with certain rules, Hunch can automatically create an ad from this post and target this ad to the people depending on the content of the post.

Also, Hunch advanced alerts and rules can help you stop bad ads and scale on good performing ads.

Amazing tool for saving your time and run ads more efficiently.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Nothing really. If there are any hiccups about the software, their team solves it really fast.

Recommendations to others considering Hunch:
This is a must-have tool for all e-commerce brands with over 50 products as it saves time and money with automatic ads creation.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving ad fatigue. Before using Hunch we were seeing that our CTR would get lower and CPC would increase. This tool solves issue of ad fatigue since it creates a lot of dynamic content automatically and your customers will see more different content. Another benefit is decreasing the costs of our design team as they do not need to create an ad for every product in our store (we have around 3000 products).
We have more time in creating a marketing strategy instead of doing repetitive work that can be automated.

all_reviews.review_title: A valuable partner who thinks along and inspires us
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
The experts at Hunch actively engage with us, promptly addressing challenges as they arise and providing swift responses to our inquiries.

Currently, we're leveraging the tool for Shopping ads, but we have yet to explore its video capabilities and dynamic video functionalities. Our goal is to integrate these features by the end of Q2. While there are numerous other functionalities offered by the tool, we have not yet had the opportunity to develop use cases for them. This is a key objective for 2024, allowing us to fully leverage Hunch as an extension of our creative team.

Presently, only our social advertising consultants utilize Hunch, but we aim to introduce the tool to our design studio. We want our designers to discover how Hunch can streamline their workflow, enabling them to create designs efficiently with a focus on social content.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Currently, we haven't encountered any aspects of Hunch that we dislike. This could be attributed to our limited exploration of the tool's full capabilities. However, we trust that the specialists at Hunch are readily available to provide solutions should any issues arise in the future.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
* Improving efficiency and effectiveness in managing Shopping ads and potentially expanding to utilize its video capabilities and dynamic functionalities

* Enhancing creativity and streamlining workflow within the design studio, particularly focusing on social content creation

* Seeking a reliable partner who can offer prompt solutions to challenges and provide valuable insights to inspire and support your team's goals

* Exploring and maximizing the full range of functionalities that Hunch offers to fully integrate it as an extension of your creative team

all_reviews.review_content:

Hunch has revolutionized the way we approach advertising. The platform's automation capabilities have propelled our advertising efforts to new heights. We no longer have to spend countless hours manually creating each creative piece or managing media placements. all_reviews.review_title: We achieved 47% lower CAC on Facebook using Hunch by delivering localised ads to over 110 areas
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
Creating customised ads at scale and publishing them to Facebook works like a breeze. During an important season, we delivered over 700 ads to over 110 ad sets on Facebook in an instant. We were able to customise creatives and copies by including dynamic values such as local slang, area name and target audiences. I also like that we can run ads directly from a Google Sheet and Google Drive (so we don't have to go into Ads Manager to create ads which is a tedious process). Hunch's customer support is top-notch. They have given us the support needed to bring our ideas into reality.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Creating new campaigns can be overwhelming if you don't create them regularly (at least I tend to forget all the nitty gritty settings that need to be set for the campaign to work out properly). However, with Hunch's awesome customer support this hasn't been an issue as they have helped us set up new campaigns everytime it has been needed.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
Save time (from the tedious process of publishing ads in Ads Manager). Publish ads at scale (we can publish hundreds of ads in an instant). Localise ads (now we can use customised ads to create more engaging content).

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best FB automation tools!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Hunch?
I love that you can make thousands of custom ads from all your e-commerce products just by creating 1 template. This helps you to test your ad creative very fast and find which one performs the best. This process would usually spend a lot of time and resources while Hunch lets you do it automatically.
You can even connect your account with Google Analytics and let Hunch create ads from just your best-performing products to increase your profit.

Another great feature is the smart automatic post boosting. This would mean that you can make your regular organic post content and with certain rules, Hunch can automatically create an ad from this post and target this ad to the people depending on the content of the post.

Also, Hunch advanced alerts and rules can help you stop bad ads and scale on good performing ads.

Amazing tool for saving your time and run ads more efficiently.

What do you dislike about Hunch?
Nothing really. If there are any hiccups about the software, their team solves it really fast.

Recommendations to others considering Hunch:
This is a must-have tool for all e-commerce brands with over 50 products as it saves time and money with automatic ads creation.

What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving ad fatigue. Before using Hunch we were seeing that our CTR would get lower and CPC would increase. This tool solves issue of ad fatigue since it creates a lot of dynamic content automatically and your customers will see more different content. Another benefit is decreasing the costs of our design team as they do not need to create an ad for every product in our store (we have around 3000 products).
We have more time in creating a marketing strategy instead of doing repetitive work that can be automated.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Hunch?
review_question_answers.answer:
I love that you can make thousands of custom ads from all your e-commerce products just by creating 1 template. This helps you to test your ad creative very fast and find which one performs the best. This process would usually spend a lot of time and resources while Hunch lets you do it automatically.
You can even connect your account with Google Analytics and let Hunch create ads from just your best-performing products to increase your profit.

Another great feature is the smart automatic post boosting. This would mean that you can make your regular organic post content and with certain rules, Hunch can automatically create an ad from this post and target this ad to the people depending on the content of the post.

Also, Hunch advanced alerts and rules can help you stop bad ads and scale on good performing ads.

Amazing tool for saving your time and run ads more efficiently.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Hunch?
review_question_answers.answer: Nothing really. If there are any hiccups about the software, their team solves it really fast.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Hunch:
review_question_answers.answer: This is a must-have tool for all e-commerce brands with over 50 products as it saves time and money with automatic ads creation.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Hunch solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
We are solving ad fatigue. Before using Hunch we were seeing that our CTR would get lower and CPC would increase. This tool solves issue of ad fatigue since it creates a lot of dynamic content automatically and your customers will see more different content. Another benefit is decreasing the costs of our design team as they do not need to create an ad for every product in our store (we have around 3000 products).
We have more time in creating a marketing strategy instead of doing repetitive work that can be automated.
